abstract: UBS is trying to shrink its investment banking business enough to satisfy investors and Swiss regulators without disrupting its other operations.
snippet: UBS is trying to shrink its investment banking business enough to satisfy investors and Swiss regulators without disrupting its other operations.
lead_paragraph: UBS is trying to shrink its investment banking business enough to satisfy investors and Swiss regulators without disrupting its other operations.

headline.main: Investment Banking’s Uncertain Future at UBS
headline.print_headline: Investment Banking Faces Diminished Future at UBS
